text: "In and Out of Love" is a 1985 song by American hard rock band Bon Jovi. It is the second single from their second studio album 7800Â° Fahrenheit. It went to number 69 in the United States and number 37 in the Billboard rock chart. ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:Bon Jovi songs
title: In and Out of Love (Bon Jovi song)
